title: [Resolved] Will I get a free premium Hextech Chest when making a new account?
body:
So I've recently moved continents (hemispheres actually!) and I've realized that it isn't viable for me to continue playing on the North American servers for many reasons. I realize that all the skins that I have bought were a waste but I have to change servers due to internet connections and playing with people in my area (as they use a different server).

My question; Will I get a free premium Hextech Chest when I unlock on my new account? Remember when Hextech launched and a free chest was given to everyone? Will I also get that opportunity? 

As I side question, is there any way of transferring all my NA Server skins to another server for free?

Thanks in advance.

replies.body:
Hey there,

I believe you receive a starter hextech chest when you hit level 3(?).

>As I side question, is there any way of transferring all my NA Server skins to another server for free?

Negative, free transfers to OCE were only offered for players who were living in OCE and playing on NA before OCE was released, paying for a transfer is definitely worth it though depending on the value of your account.
Thanks for the answer. I hit Lv 5 and I still don't have a promo chest..
Hello!! Riot pls give me ziggs and projec yasuo!! And zed and shocbleid zedd!! Pls riot to 2dena!!
